snippet: Security officials are investigating drone flights that have buzzed illegally over more than a dozen nuclear facilities across France.
abstract: French security officials are investigating mysterious wave of drone flights that have illegally buzzed over more than dozen nuclear plants across the country.
lead_paragraph: Security officials are investigating drone flights that have buzzed illegally over more than a dozen nuclear facilities across France.

headline.main: Unidentified Drones Are Seen Above French Nuclear Plants
headline.print_headline: Unidentified Drones Are Seen Above French Nuclear Plants
